title: Christmas in Ukraine: 'Despite the war, our children want to feel happy'
summary: Ukraine’s Volodymyr Zelensky says he's hoping for an answer from Moscow on Wednesday to the draft peace plan hashed out between Washington and Kyiv. Meanwhile, the president's compatriots are preparing to celebrate yet another Christmas under Russian invasion. After nearly four years of war, the population continues to be subjected to near-nightly missile a…
